title: IConfigurationManager.SetExpanded
description: Sets whether to display and expand all of the configuration nodes in the specified pane of the ConfigurationManager.
signature:
void SetExpanded( 
   System.Int32
WhichPane
,
   System.Boolean
Expand
)
